outputs.name: mesh
outputs.description: Meshes of the room floors colored according to their attributes.

outputs.name: legend
outputs.description: Geometry representing the legend for colored meshes.

outputs.name: wire_frame
outputs.description: A list of lines representing the outlines of the rooms.

outputs.name: values
outputs.description:
A list of values that align with the input _rooms noting the
attribute assigned to each room.

outputs.name: colors
outputs.description:
A list of colors that align with the input Rooms, noting the color
of each Room in the Rhino scene. This can be used in conjunction
with the native Grasshopper "Custom Preview" component and other
honeybee visualization components (like "HB Visulaize Quick") to
create custom visualizations in the Rhino scene.

inputs.name: _rooms_model
inputs.description:
An array of honeybee Rooms or honeybee Models to be colored
with their attributes in the Rhino scene.

inputs.name: _attribute
inputs.description:
Text for the name of the Room attribute with which the
Rooms should be labeled. The Honeybee "Room Attributes" component
lists all of the core attributes of the room. Also, each Honeybee
extension (ie. Radiance, Energy) includes its own component that
lists the Room attributes of that extension.

inputs.name: legend_par_
inputs.description:
An optional LegendParameter object to change the display
of the colored rooms (Default: None).

try:  # import the core honeybee dependencies
    from honeybee.model import Model
    from honeybee.colorobj import ColorRoom
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import honeybee:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:  # import the ladybug_{{cad}} dependencies
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.fromgeometry import from_face3ds_to_colored_mesh, \
        from_polyface3d_to_wireframe
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.fromobjects import legend_objects
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.color import color_to_color
    from ladybug_{{cad}}.{{plugin}} import all_required_inputs
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import ladybug_{{cad}}:\n\t{}'.format(e))


if all_required_inputs(ghenv.Component):
    # extract any rooms from input Models
    rooms = []
    for hb_obj in _rooms_model:
        if isinstance(hb_obj, Model):
            rooms.extend(hb_obj.rooms)
        else:
            rooms.append(hb_obj)

    # create the ColorRoom visualization object and output geometry
    color_obj = ColorRoom(rooms, _attribute, legend_par_)
    graphic = color_obj.graphic_container
    mesh = [from_face3ds_to_colored_mesh(flrs, col) for flrs, col in
            zip(color_obj.floor_faces, graphic.value_colors)]
    wire_frame = []
    for room in rooms:
        wire_frame.extend(from_polyface3d_to_wireframe(room.geometry))
    legend = legend_objects(graphic.legend)
    values = color_obj.attributes
    colors = [color_to_color(col) for col in graphic.value_colors]
